sentences.english: Thin card sliver due to web falling at cards.
sentences.chinese: 由于梳棉棉网下坠导致条子过细。

sentences.english: Standard is too weak, welding rod is careful, transporting strip improperly etc. can cause to not weld fully.
sentences.chinese: 规范太弱，焊条过细，运条不当等会导致未焊满。

sentences.english: “I don’t want to oversimplify, ” he says.
Don't get too detailed on this or go overboard with your preparations.
sentences.chinese: 清单不宜过细，对准备工作也别过于耿耿于怀了。

sentences.english: Writing successfully requires knowing how to attract niche audiences with depth and detail.
sentences.chinese: 胜利的写作要供懂得怎样深刻过细地吸引住特定受众。

sentences.english: System sand blasting equipment jaw crusher resettlement interloper incident.
sentences.chinese: 制砂设备颚式破碎机安置过细事变。

sentences.english: Experts advise paying close attention to the micro-expressions that a face can't hide.
sentences.chinese: 专家发起密切过细那些渺小的心情，脸是藏不住的。
